definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Bohai regime of Tang Dynasty had a frequent intercourse with Japan.
sentences.chinese: 唐代渤海政权与日本隔海相望，往来频繁。

sentences.english: Shekou industrial zone is located in shenzhen, and Hong Kong island.
sentences.chinese: 蛇口工业区位于深圳，与香港隔海相望。

sentences.english: Marine volcanics of Early Ordovician was found in Zhifang region.
sentences.chinese: 纸房地区具有早奥陶世海相火山岩存在。

sentences.english: The exploration and research levels of Middle Paleozoic marine strata are low in West Pingle Depression.
sentences.chinese: 萍乐坳陷西部中古生界海相区块勘探与研究程度较低。

sentences.english: The unconformity marks the change from fluvial to marginal marine deposition.
sentences.chinese: 不整合面标志着河相至边缘海相沉积的相变。

sentences.english: Lianyungang marine soft clay is muck and mucky soil.
sentences.chinese: 连云港地区的软土是海相淤泥和淤泥质土。

sentences.english: This method will have a good applied foreground in marine strata in southern China.
sentences.chinese: 此方法在中国南方海相沉积盆地可有较好的应用前景。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is a marine sedimentary-metamorphic iron ore deposit.
sentences.chinese: 铁矿床属海相沉积变质成因。

sentences.english: New Zealand is an island that lies off the east of Australia.
sentences.chinese: 新西兰是澳大利亚以东隔海相望的一个岛屿。

sentences.english: Hainan province is offshore across from the Leizhou Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 其雷州半岛与海南省隔海相望。

sentences.english: China and ASEAN countries are linked by the same mountains and rivers or face each other across the sea.
sentences.chinese: 中国与东盟国家或山水相连，或隔海相望。

sentences.english: It lies in the North Atlantic Ocean off the north coast of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 它位于大西洋北部，与欧洲海洋的北海岸隔海相望。

sentences.english: The slope belts developed in large depressed lake basins are similar to continental slopes in marine basins.
sentences.chinese: 大型坳陷湖盆中存在与海相盆地中陆坡相似的坡折带。

sentences.english: And how could an island wipe out a metropolis an ocean away?
sentences.chinese: 一个小岛如何横扫隔海相望的大都市？

definition: to look at one another/to face each other
lower Cambrian series (geological strata from approx 530 million years ago)
